title: PR 9 (of  10) Issue 5066 nu-command strings
body:
## Release notes summary - What our users need to know
This PR 9 (of 10 for Issue 5066) improves command descriptions, flag descriptions, and example descriptions for string-related commands in `crates/nu-command/src/strings/`, as part of [Issue #5066](https://github.com/nushell/nushell/issues/5066) â€” "Help us with better command and parameter/flag descriptions."

## Changes

- **ansi**: `--list` switch description (e.g. "List available ansi code names.")
- **base (base32, base64, hex)**: Decode command descriptions (e.g. "Decode a Base32-encoded value.")
- **char**: Switch descriptions for `--list`, `--unicode`, `--integer`
- **detect columns**: `--no-headers` switch description
- **format (date, duration, filesize)**: `--list` and example descriptions
- **parse**: `--regex` switch and example descriptions
- **split (chars, column, list, row, words)**: Switch and example descriptions
- **str (capitalize, downcase, upcase, contains, distance, ends_with, expand, index_of, join, length, replace, reverse, starts_with, stats, substring, trim)**: Command/switch/example descriptions

All edits are help text only (capitalization, punctuation, clarity). No behavior or logic changes.

Fixes #5066 (strings subset).
